content.statement_text: An investment adviser that has assets under management of less than $25 million, or such higher amount as the Commission may by rule deem appropriate, did not have total assets of $5 million or more on the last day of the most recent fiscal year, and does not control, is not controlled by, and is not under common control with another investment adviser that has assets under management of $25 million or more, or any person (other than a natural person) that had total assets of $5 million or more on the last day of the most recent fiscal year.

classification.explanation: The statement provides a detailed definition of 'Investment adviser' using a hypernym ('investment adviser') and several distinguishing characteristics (assets under management, control conditions).

content.statement_text: Assets under management, as defined under Section 203A(a)(3) of the Act and reported on its annual updating amendment to Form ADV, of less than $25 million, or such higher amount as the Commission may by rule deem appropriate.

classification.explanation: The statement defines 'Assets under management' by specifying a hypernym ('assets') and a characteristic (less than $25 million or as deemed appropriate by the Commission).

content.statement_text: An investment adviser that has assets under management of less than $25 million, or such higher amount as the Commission may by rule deem appropriate, did not have total assets of $5 million or more on the last day of the most recent fiscal year, and does not control, is not controlled by, and is not under common control with another investment adviser that has assets under management of $25 million or more, or any person (other than a natural person) that had total assets of $5 million or more on the last day of the most recent fiscal year.

classification.explanation: The statement provides a detailed definition of 'Investment adviser' using a hypernym ('investment adviser') and several distinguishing characteristics (assets under management, control conditions).

content.statement_text: The total assets as shown on the balance sheet of the investment adviser or other person, or the balance sheet of the investment adviser or such other person with its subsidiaries consolidated, whichever is larger.

classification.explanation: The statement defines 'Total assets' by specifying a hypernym ('assets') and a characteristic (as shown on the balance sheet, considering subsidiaries).

content.statement_text: An investment adviser that has assets under management of less than $25 million, or such higher amount as the Commission may by rule deem appropriate, did not have total assets of $5 million or more on the last day of the most recent fiscal year, and does not control, is not controlled by, and is not under common control with another investment adviser that has assets under management of $25 million or more, or any person (other than a natural person) that had total assets of $5 million or more on the last day of the most recent fiscal year.

classification.explanation: The statement provides a detailed definition of 'Investment adviser' using a hypernym ('investment adviser') and several distinguishing characteristics (assets under management, control conditions).

content.statement_text: Assets under management, as defined under Section 203A(a)(3) of the Act and reported on its annual updating amendment to Form ADV, of less than $25 million, or such higher amount as the Commission may by rule deem appropriate.

classification.explanation: The statement defines 'Assets under management' by specifying a hypernym ('assets') and a characteristic (less than $25 million or as deemed appropriate by the Commission).

content.statement_text: The power, directly or indirectly, to direct the management or policies of a person, whether through ownership of securities, by contract, or otherwise.

classification.explanation: The statement defines 'Control' by specifying a hypernym ('power') and a characteristic (directing management or policies through various means).

content.statement_text: A person is presumed to control a limited liability company (LLC) if the person directly or indirectly has the right to vote 25 percent or more of a class of the interests of the LLC, has the right to receive upon dissolution, or has contributed, 25 percent or more of the capital of the LLC, or is an elected manager of the LLC.

classification.explanation: The statement defines conditions under which a person is presumed to control an LLC, specifying a hypernym ('person') and characteristics (voting rights, capital contribution, management role).

content.statement_text: The total assets as shown on the balance sheet of the investment adviser or other person, or the balance sheet of the investment adviser or such other person with its subsidiaries consolidated, whichever is larger.

classification.explanation: The statement defines 'Total assets' by specifying a hypernym ('assets') and a characteristic (as shown on the balance sheet, considering subsidiaries).

content.statement_text: An investment adviser that has assets under management of less than $25 million, or such higher amount as the Commission may by rule deem appropriate, did not have total assets of $5 million or more on the last day of the most recent fiscal year, and does not control, is not controlled by, and is not under common control with another investment adviser that has assets under management of $25 million or more, or any person (other than a natural person) that had total assets of $5 million or more on the last day of the most recent fiscal year.

classification.explanation: The statement defines 'investment adviser' using a hypernym and distinguishing characteristics. The hypernym is 'investment adviser,' and the characteristics include having assets under management of less than $25 million, not having total assets of $5 million or more, and not being controlled by or under common control with another adviser with significant assets. This matches the structure of a formal intensional definition.
